entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Matagami
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:22 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 1.3°C
